description: Introduces a text-only mode to the existing ECS Express Mode service commands. Text-only mode can be enabled via ``ecs monitor-express-mode-service --mode TEXT-ONLY``, ``ecs create-express-mode-service --monitor-mode TEXT-ONLY``, ``ecs update-express-mode-service --monitor-mode TEXT-ONLY``, or ``ecs delete-express-mode-service --monitor-mode TEXT-ONLY``.
